title: So you had a bad day
itunes:title: So you had a bad day
description:
Danielle and Brooke cover a wide range of topics on this episode, from their feelings on wearing masks to both of them being movie talkers. On this episode they also talk about how its ok to not be ok and offer some tips for dealing with bad days along with some mood boosters.

Brooke Miccio  

Danielle Carolan

@daniellecarolan @brookemiccio Talk to you guys next Wednesday and for the next episode!
